li.a: 2019 - 2020 Grand Saline ISD Student Handbook - English

div.div: There will be a public hearing on the Texas Academic Performance Report (TARP) Monday night, February 10th , at 6:30 PM located in the Middle School Library at 400 Stadium Drive. Parents and community members are invited to attend.
